GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves one article selected by id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles sorted by date in descending order, where each article has the attributes as shown in below example

articles.title: UNCOVERED: catspiracy to bring down democracy
articles.author: rogersop

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments for the given article_id sorted by their created_at attribute in descending order
